titleStmt.title: The Hvmble petition of divers baronets, knights, esquires, gentlemen, clergy, and freeholders of the covnty of Lincolne to the right honorable the House of Commons now in the high court of Parliament assembled : with a letter sent to Master Speaker from the knights, esquiers, gentry, and freeholders of the same county ; for the presenting of their petition to the honourable House of Commons now in Parliament assembled.

The Hvmble petition of divers baronets, knights, esquires, gentlemen, clergy, and freeholders of the covnty of Lincolne to the right honorable the House of Commons now in the high court of Parliament assembled : with a letter sent to Master Speaker from the knights, esquiers, gentry, and freeholders of the same county ; for the presenting of their petition to the honourable House of Commons now in Parliament assembled.

notesStmt.note: A pro-royalst petition, originally printed as a broadside. cf. Steele 225, England.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
